trans-unit.source: Represents a polyline annotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示聚合線條註解。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets the annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 取得註解類型。

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 供內部使用，應該不使用。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 unmanaged 資源並，或者，managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of an anchor cap at the end of the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解行尾的結尾的錨點端點樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> value that represents the style used for an anchor cap located at the end of an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"> </xref>位於結尾的註解行尾的值，表示錨點端點所使用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於聚合線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path points of a polyline annotation at run time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在執行階段的聚合線條註解路徑點。

trans-unit.source: A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 聚合線條都必須使用座標相對於註解物件，其中 (0，0) 代表左上角座標和 (100100) 代表註解的右下角座標。

trans-unit.source: This property is not accessible at design time, when you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPathPoints%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能存取在設計階段，當您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPathPoints%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPathPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: A GraphicsPath object with the polyline shape.
trans-unit.target: GraphicsPath 物件與聚合線條的圖形。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path points of the polyline annotation at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在設計階段的聚合線條註解路徑點。

trans-unit.source: A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 聚合線條都必須使用座標相對於註解物件，其中 (0，0) 代表左上角座標和 (100100) 代表註解的右下角座標。

trans-unit.source: This property is not accessible at run time, when you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPath%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能存取在執行階段，當您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPath%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPointCollection"></xref> object with the polyline shape.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPointCollection"> </xref>聚合線條的圖形物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether an annotation should be placed using the free-draw mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定決定是否應該使用手繪模式放置註解的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Two different placement modes are supported when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BeginPlacement%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 支援兩種不同的位置模式時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BeginPlacement%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BeginPlacement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the IsFreeDrawPlacement property to `true` to switch from the default mode to free-draw mode, which allows the user to freely-draw while moving the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 將 IsFreeDrawPlacement 屬性設定為`true`從預設模式切換至手繪模式，讓使用者能夠自由地繪製在移動滑鼠游標時。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if an annotation should be placed using free-draw mode, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果應該使用手繪模式中，否則置放註解<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a style for the anchor cap at the start of the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解行尾的開頭的錨點端點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> value that represents the style for an anchor cap located at the start of an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"> </xref>表示錨點端點的樣式值位於註解行尾的開頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的文字樣式。

trans-unit.source: A TextStyle value used to draw the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製文字的樣式值。
